name: Greenlake
description: Mixed ages and levels. Open play hours are from 6pm to Sunset.
address: 7201 East Green Lake Dr N, Seattle, WA 98115

name: Everest Park
description: Dedicated pickleball courts. Always open play except when there are league matches on Tues/Thurs summer evenings.

name: Shoreview Park
description: Dedicated pickleball courts. Hosts many Seattle-area tournaments.
address: 700 NW Innis Arden Way Shoreline, WA 98177

name: Battle Point Park
description: Dedicated pickleball courts. Home of the annual Founders Tournament.
address: 11299 Arrow Point Dr NE, Bainbridge Island, WA 98110
